name: CategoryTheory.KleisliCat.id_def
initialProofState:
m : Type u_1 → Type u_2
inst✝ : Monad m
α : CategoryTheory.KleisliCat m
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id α) Pure.pure
decl:
@[simp]
theorem KleisliCat.id_def {m} [Monad m] (α : KleisliCat m) : 𝟙 α = @pure m _ α :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.KleisliCat.comp_def
initialProofState:
m : Type u_1 → Type u_2
inst✝ : Monad m
α β γ : CategoryTheory.KleisliCat m
xs : Quiver.Hom α β
ys : Quiver.Hom β γ
a : α
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp xs ys a) (Bind.bind (xs a) ys)
decl:
theorem KleisliCat.comp_def {m} [Monad m] (α β γ : KleisliCat m) (xs : α ⟶ β) (ys : β ⟶ γ) (a : α) :
    (xs ≫ ys) a = xs a >>= ys :=
  rfl
